cause.description:
Vote for me and i will help everyone and do everything you want! I will build low income housing, I will help more schools come to this city, I will fix calgary transit, and implement busses to go past the calgary limits and to service rural areas . I will make calgary a city everyone can live in and abolish greed! Vote for me !! yeah!
1. Calgarian are being taken advantage of and their rights are being ignored. Its time for a change!
2. I will be a mayor who cares about the people and not about the $$$ only
3. Lets make calgary the city it used to be.
cause.name: Heather Gwynn for mayor!
